column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The sangrias here are great. Any flavor is good
column2: but I prefer the flavored ones over the traditional.  The meats are cooked really well and the potatas bravas are always good. The least impressive thing I've had on the menu is the escargot.  I've had it twice and both times it was overpowered by the cheese.  Good place to take date
column3: if reservations seem too late just walk in
column4: they always seem to seat me.
